flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Must be unique per project (case-insensitive) when provided.

flags.name: --backup-estimate-set
flags.validation: If provided, backup estimate set must belong to the same project and cannot create a backup cycle.

permissions: Allowed for users who can update the related project (ProjectPolicy update? via delegated policy).
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --name, --created-by, or --backup-estimate-set must be provided. Name must be unique per project (case-insensitive) when provided. If provided, backup estimate set must belong to the same project and cannot create a backup chain that points back to this estimate set.
